001package com.github.sormuras.bach.project;
002
003import java.nio.file.Path;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.Collection;
006import java.util.List;
007
008/** A collection of possibly targeted folders. */
009public record Folders(Collection<Folder> values) {
010
011  public static Folders of(Folder... folders) {
012    return new Folders(List.of(folders));
013  }
014
015  public Folders add(Folder folder) {
016    var values = new ArrayList<>(this.values);
017    values.add(folder);
018    return new Folders(values);
019  }
020
021  public List<Path> list(int release, FolderType... types) {
022    return list(release, List.of(types));
023  }
024
025  public List<Path> list(int release, List<FolderType> types) {
026    return values.stream()
027        .filter(path -> path.version() == release)
028        .filter(path -> path.types().values().containsAll(types))
029        .map(Folder::directory)
030        .toList();
031  }
032}
